cu.explanation_en: Setting Asn1_verbosity to an unknown enum like 'invalid' will cause ASN.1 verbosity configuration errors.

du.explanation_en: Setting pMax to 100 dBm, which exceeds the maximum allowed transmit power, will cause configuration validation errors.
du.explanation_zh: 將 pMax 設定為 100 dBm，這超出允許的最大發射功率，會導致配置驗證錯誤。
